text: and the clans of Kiriath-jearim: the Ithrites, the Puthites, the Shumathites, and the Mishraites. From these the Zorahites and the Eshtaolites derived.
descendants of Barkos, descendants of Sisera, descendants of Temah,
Joseph, when in distress, kept the commandment, and he became master of Egypt.
